name: Dark Godot Docs
description: Dark theme for the Godot Engine documentation.
additional_info:
Release Feb 7th 2020
- Always visible search merged into mainline docs; removing from theme now that officially supported. General styling of new search.

Release Jan 9th 2020
- Always visible search; styled & visible scrollbars.

Release Nov 10th 2019
- Style new separators between elements.

Release June 23rd 2019
- Added styling for attention boxes.
